tit.j: 京都ハリストス正教会

sen.j: 京都ハリストス正教会（きょうとはりすとすせいきょうかい）は京都府京都市中京区にある正教会（ギリシャ正教）・日本ハリストス正教会の教会。
sen.e: Kyoto Orthodox Church, located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a church of Japan Orthodox Church of the Orthodox Church (Greek Orthodox Church).
Kyoto Orthodox Church, located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is an Orthodox church of Japan (Greek Orthodox Church).
Kyoto Orthodox Church, located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is an Orthodox church of Japan (Greek Orthodox Church).

sen.j: 京都ハリストス正教会の聖堂である生神女福音大聖堂は日本正教会西日本主教教区の主教座聖堂であり、日本正教会の現存する聖堂・会堂のうち、最古級の本格的ロシア・ビザンティン建築による正教会の聖堂である（「最古」の表現については後述）。
sen.e: The Cathedral of the Annunciation of Kyoto Orthodox Church is the cathedral at which the bishop of the western diocese of Japan Orthodox Church is staioned, and it is the oldest real Russian-Byzantine architecture among existent cathedrals/churches of Japan Orthodox Church. (the meaning of "the oldest" is to be mentioned below).

The Cathedral of the Annunciation of Kyoto Orthodox Church is where the bishop of the western diocese is staioned, and is the oldest genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture among existent cathedrals/churches of Orthodox Japanese Churches. (the meaning of "the oldest" is mentioned below).

The Cathedral of the Annunciation of Kyoto Orthodox Church is where the bishop of the western diocese is stationed, and is the oldest genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture among existent cathedrals and churches of Orthodox Japanese Churches (the meaning of 'the oldest' is mentioned below).

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 京都における正教会伝道の歴史は1880年代に始まる。
sen.e: The history of missionary work of Orthodox Church in Kyoto dates back to 1880's.
The history of missionary work of the Orthodox Church in Kyoto dates back to 1880's.
The history of missionary work of the Orthodox Church in Kyoto dates back to 1880's.

sen.j: 初期の伝道には伝教者パワェル中小路・伝教者キリル笹葉政吉が大阪正教会の管轄司祭イオアン小野荘五郎の臨時管轄下のもと当たった。
sen.e: A catechist Pawaeru NAKAKOJI and a catechist Masayoshi Kirill SASABA were engaged in the initial missionary work under the temporary supervision of Jhon Sogoro ONO. the presiding priest of Osaka Orthodox Church.

Catechist Pawaeru NAKAKOJI and Catechist Masayoshi Kirill SASABA were engaged in the initial missionary work under the temporary supervision of Jhon Sogoro ONO. the presiding priest of the Osaka Orthodox Church.

Catechist Pawaeru NAKAKOJI and Catechist Masayoshi Kirill SASABA were engaged in the initial missionary work under the temporary supervision of John Sogoro ONO, the presiding priest of the Osaka Orthodox Church.

sen.j: 1889年には講義所が設置される。
sen.e: A lecture hall was established in 1889.
A lecture hall was established in 1889.
A lecture hall was established in 1889.

sen.j: のちモスクワ総主教となった修道司祭（肩書当時）セルギイ・ストラゴロドスキイは1890年から1890年にかけて京都正教会を牧会した。
sen.e: Sergius Sutoragodorosukii, a priest (title of that time) who later became the Metropolitan of Moscow, conducted pastoral activity at Kyoto Orthodox Church.
Sergius Sutoragodorosukii, a priest (title at that time) who later became the Metropolitan of Moscow, conducted pastoral activity at the Kyoto Orthodox Church.
Sergius Sutoragodorosukii, a priest (title at that time) who later became the Metropolitan of Moscow, conducted pastoral activity at the Kyoto Orthodox Church.

sen.j: 京都正教女学校が当初設置されたが、これは現存していない。
sen.e: Kyoto Orthodox Church Girls' School was established, but it is not in existence at present.
Kyoto Orthodox Church Girls' School was established, but it does not presently exist.
Kyoto Orthodox Church Girls' School was established, but it does not presently exist.

sen.j: 1906年にはニコライ・カサートキンの輔佐として京都の初代主教となったアンドロニク・ニコリスキイが着任したが、在任僅か3ヶ月で病のため帰国した。
sen.e: In 1906, Andronik Nicolsky became the first bishop of Kyoto as an assistant of Nikolai Kasatkin, but he returned to Russia due to illness after only three months in office.
In 1906, Andronik Nicolsky became the first bishop of Kyoto as an assistant of Nikolai Kasatkin, but he returned to Russia due to illness after only three months in office.
In 1906, Andronik Nicolsky became the first bishop of Kyoto as an assistant of Nikolai Kasatkin, but he returned to Russia due to illness after only three months in office.

sen.j: なおアンドロニクは、帰国後ボリシェビキ政権によって生き埋めにされ銃殺され、のちに致命者として列聖された。
sen.e: After returned, Andronik was buried alive and shot death by the Bolshevik regime, and he was later canonized as a martyr.
After returning, Andronik was buried alive and shot death by the Bolshevik regime, and he was later canonized as a martyr.
After returning, Andronik was buried alive and shot death by the Bolshevik regime, and he was later canonized as a martyr.

sen.j: このためアンドロニクは「ペルミの神品致命者聖アンドロニク」との称号の他に、「初代京都の主教聖アンドロニク」とも日本正教会で呼ばれて敬われている。
sen.e: Thereafter, Andronik was conferred the title "Hieromartyr Andronik, Archbishop of Perm", and he has been revered in Japan Orthodox Church as "Saint Andronik, the first bishop of Kyoto".
Thereafter, Andronik was conferred the title "Hieromartyr Andronik, Archbishop of Perm," and he has been revered in the Japan Orthodox Church as "Saint Andronik, the first bishop of Kyoto".
Thereafter, Andronik was conferred the title 'Hieromartyr Andronik, Archbishop of Perm,' and he has been revered in the Japan Orthodox Church as 'Saint Andronik, the first bishop of Kyoto.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: 「京都の主教」の主教座教会であるが、現在、京都の主教は日本正教会の首座主教である「東京の大主教・全日本の府主教」たる主代郁夫が兼任しており、2008年9月現在、京都教会に主教は常駐していない。
sen.e: Although "bishop of Kyoto" is supposed to be stationed at this church, no bishop is being stationed as of September 2008 since Ikuo NUSHIRO, the "archbishop of Tokyo/Metropolitan priest of Japan" who is the Primate of Japan Orthodox Church, is concurrently assuming the position.

Although "bishop of Kyoto" is supposed to be stationed at this church, no bishop has being stationed as of September 2008 since Ikuo NUSHIRO, the "archbishop of Tokyo/Metropolitan priest of Japan" who is the Primate of Japan Orthodox Church, is concurrently assuming the position.

Although 'bishop of Kyoto' is supposed to be stationed at this church, no bishop has being stationed as of September 2008 since Ikuo NUSHIRO, the 'archbishop of Tokyo and Metropolitan priest of Japan' who is the Primate of Japan Orthodox Church, is concurrently assuming the position.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: 生神女福音聖堂
sen.e: The Cathedral of the Annunciation
The Cathedral of the Annunciation
The Cathedral of the Annunciation

sen.j: 生神女福音聖堂は1901年に正教会の京都聖堂として建設された。
sen.e: The Cathedral of the Annunciation was constructed in 1901 as the Kyoto cathedral of Orthodox Church.
The Cathedral of the Annunciation was constructed in 1901 as the Kyoto cathedral of the Orthodox Church.
The Cathedral of the Annunciation was constructed in 1901 as the Kyoto cathedral of the Orthodox Church.

sen.j: 設計は、京都府庁旧本館等を設計した松室重光。
sen.e: It was designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who also designed the former building of Kyoto Prefectural Office.
It was designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who also designed the former building of Kyoto Prefectural Office.
It was designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who also designed including the former building of Kyoto Prefectural Office.

sen.j: 聖堂の成聖式はロシア正教会から寄付されたモスクワ製の聖像(イコン)30枚が嵌め込まれたイコノスタシス、教鐘、大燈明等の到着と設置を待って1903年5月10日に行われた。
sen.e: The consecration was conducted on May 10, 1903 after the arrival of Moscow-made iconostasis with 30 holy icons being inserted, church bells and votive candles that were donated by Russian Orthodox Church.

The consecration was conducted on May 10, 1903 after the arrival of a Moscow-made iconostasis with 30 holy icons being inserted, church bells, and votive candles that were donated by the Russian Orthodox Church.

The consecration was conducted on May 10, 1903 after the arrival of a Moscow-made iconostasis with 30 holy icons being inserted, church bells, and votive candles that were donated by the Russian Orthodox Church.

sen.j: 建築様式はロシア・ビザンチン様式で、最大幅15m、奥行27m、総高 22mの規模をもつ。
sen.e: Its architectural style is Russian-Byzantine style and its maximum width, depth and height are 15m, 27m and 22m respectively.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Its architectue is Russian-Byzantine style and its maximum width, depth, and height are 15m, 27m and 22m respectively.
Its architecture is Russian-Byzantine style and its maximum width, depth, and height are 15 meters, 27 meters and 22 meters respectively.

sen.j: 玄関、啓蒙所、聖所、至聖所が一直線に並んで聖所を中心にして平面的に十字架を形成する。
sen.e: Its gate, enlightenment hall, sanctuary and holy of holies are placed in a straight line and they form the planar Cross with a sanctuary in the center.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Its gate, enlightenment hall, sanctuary, and holy of holies are placed in a straight line and they form the planar Cross with a sanctuary in the center.
Its gate, enlightenment hall, sanctuary, and holy of holies are placed in a straight line and they form the planar Cross with a sanctuary in the center.

sen.j: 「最古のビザンティン建築」かどうか
sen.e: "The oldest Byzantine Architecture" or not
Whether it is "The oldest Byzantine Architecture" or not
Whether it is 'The oldest Byzantine Architecture' or not
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: 冒頭にある「最古級の本格的ロシア・ビザンティン建築による正教会の聖堂」という表現については説明を要する。
sen.e: Explanations are necessary for the first above description of "the oldest real Russian-Byzantine architecture among the cathedrals of Japan Orthodox Church".
An explanation is necessary for the first above description of "the oldest genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture among the cathedrals of Japan Orthodox Churches."
An explanation is necessary for the first above description of 'the oldest genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture among the cathedrals of Japan Orthodox Churches.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: 確かに京都ハリストス正教会・生神女福音聖堂は、日本正教会において最古級の聖堂であることは間違いない。
sen.e: There is no doubt that the Cathedral of the Annunciation of Kyoto Orthodox Church is the oldest cathedral among those of Japan Orthodox Church.
There is no doubt that the Cathedral of the Annunciation of the Kyoto Orthodox Church is the oldest cathedral among those of Japan Orthodox Churches.
There is no doubt that the Cathedral of the Annunciation of the Kyoto Orthodox Church is the oldest cathedral among those of Japan Orthodox Churches.

sen.j: しかしながら現存する最古の正教会の会堂であり、日本における最古の木造教会建築でもあるものは石巻ハリストス正教会の旧会堂：聖使徒イオアン会堂である。
sen.e: However, the oldest cathedral of Orthodox Church in existence as well as the oldest wooden church building in existence in Japan is the St. John the Apostle Cathedral, a former cathedral of Ishinomaki Orthodox Church.

However, the oldest cathedral of Orthodox Church in existence as well as the oldest wooden church building in existence in Japan is the St. John the Apostle Cathedral, a former cathedral of the Ishinomaki Orthodox Church.

However, the oldest cathedral of Orthodox Church in existence as well as the oldest wooden church building in existence in Japan is the St. John the Apostle Cathedral, a former cathedral of the Ishinomaki Orthodox Church.

sen.j: ただし「本格的なロシア・ビザンティン建築の聖堂」と言えるかという点では、石巻ハリストス正教会の旧会堂は要件を満たすとは言いがたい。
sen.e: However, it is hard to say that the former cathedral of Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is "the cathedral of real Russian-Byzantine architecture".
However, it is hard to say that the former cathedral of Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is "a cathedral of genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture".
However, it is hard to say that the former cathedral of Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is 'a cathedral of genuine Russian-Byzantine architecture.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: また石巻ハリストス正教会は現在、新築した聖堂を使用しており、旧会堂は教会の会堂としては使用されておらず、移築され文化財として保存されているのみである。
sen.e: Further, Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is using newly constructed cathedral at present, and the former cathedral, which was moved to another place and is being preserved as a cultural property, is not being used as a cathedral of church.

Further, Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is using a newly constructed cathedral at present, and the former cathedral, that was moved to another location is being preserved as a cultural property, and is not being used as a church cathedral.

Further, Ishinomaki Orthodox Church is using a newly constructed cathedral at present, and the former cathedral, that was moved to another location is being preserved as a cultural property, and is not being used as a church cathedral.

sen.j: また、ニコライ堂は竣工は1891年であって京都ハリストス正教会の1903年よりも早いが、ドーム部分と鐘楼に大幅な変更を加えた上で1929年に再建している。
sen.e: Also, St. Nicholas Church was completed in 1891, earlier than the completion of Kyoto Orthodox Church in 1903, but it was reconstructed in 1929 making substantial change to its dome-like roof and bell-tower.

Also, St. Nicholas Church was completed in 1891, earlier than the completion of the Kyoto Orthodox Church in 1903, but it was reconstructed in 1929 making a substantial change to its dome-like roof and bell-tower.

Also, St. Nicholas Church was completed in 1891, earlier than the completion of the Kyoto Orthodox Church in 1903, but it was reconstructed in 1929 making a substantial change to its dome-like roof and bell-tower.

sen.j: 従って、ニコライ堂と京都ハリストス正教会のいずれを「最古のビザンティン建築」とするかは議論が分かれるであろう。
sen.e: Therefore, there could be some debate over which is "the oldest Byzantine Architecture", either St. Nicholas Church or Kyoto Orthodox Church.
Therefore, there could be some debate over which has "the oldest Byzantine Architecture," either St. Nicholas Church or the Kyoto Orthodox Church.
Therefore, there could be some debate over which has 'the oldest Byzantine Architecture,' either St. Nicholas Church or the Kyoto Orthodox Church.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.e: Ten minutes walk from the Marutamachi Station of Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line.
